title: How long is my Honor Locked?
body: For those who are wondering how long does your honor stay locked after a 14 day ban I have the answer. After getting unbanned my honor was locked for 4 days. I play league a lot and I got out of bronze within that time period. I'm still honor 0 but I just got my honor unlocked. I will keep you posted.

replies.body: UPDATE 5/04/18 I have reached the first checkpoint of honor level 0~!
My honor has now been locked for over 4 months :P

UPDATE: 6/2/18

I've reached the 3rd checkpoint in honor level 0.
Has zero effect on the game so not much is lost.
Playing clash with my friends.. earning keyfrags... end of season rewards... there's a few things that come into play.
i got chat restriction and my honor has been locked for a bit 2 weeks now
Hmm... I played ALOT of league within those 4 days and I did boost up a rank in ranked Solo Q soo idk if that has anything to do with that.
Kinda of a misleading title, but i'd say helpful post.
I was looking up questions like this and there wasn't any recent ones so once my honor unlocked I posted this...
yeah same, my honor was also locked for 4 days.
nice! mine was unlocked in 4 days too
